name: Boss Insights : Invoice Factoring Example
description: Using accounting app data to show a list of invoices for factoring

ORG_NAME.description: The name of your company that should be shown to users. EXAMPLE: Example Capital Corp

ORG_URL.description: Your Boss Insights account url. EXAMPLE: https://example.myintranetapps.com

API_KEY.description: API Key used to identify API requests for your account. EXAMPLE: APIPROJECT3

API_SECRET.description: API Secret used to authenticate requests for your account

ADMIN_URL.description: The URL to your admin app. This is region dependant and will vary depending on your data residency. EXAMPLE: https://admin.myintranetapps.com

ACCOUNT_KEY.description: Your Boss Insights account unique identifier. EXAMPLE: 5ff363e48e2a82.98390839

BRAND_ACCENT_COLOR.description: A HTML hexadecimal color code that will be used in the example app as a bold color for buttons and other accents. EXAMPLE: CA76F6

BRAND_LOGO.description: The URL to your company logo, will be displayed at the top of each page. EXAMPLE: https://example.com/images/logo.png
